original_proof:
Since
\begin{eqnarray*}
\left|\int_a^b F_n(x)\,dx-\int_a^b F(x)\,dx\right|\ar\le \int_a^b
|F_n(x)-F(x)|\,dx\\
\ar\le  (b-a)\|F_n-F\|_S
\end{eqnarray*}
and $\lim_{n\to\infty}\|F_n-F\|_S=0$, the conclusion follows.
